subject: Jaime on YouTube
event:
A reader named Wes Nelson sent me this YouTube link.

Some of my readers are... odd.

comments.article: I hope the next video is the hand of Tyrion pouring out the wine.

comments.upictitle: αму løvε: me; late at night
comments.article: haha! That's awesome.

comments.upictitle: Jeanne / Xaviara al'Nady / Tita Kini: PolarBear
comments.article: Indeed!
We need a techno remix of this YESTERDAY.
I really don't find that funny to be honest.
LOL.  You just figured that out? ;)
comments.subject: Some of my readers are... odd.

comments.article: Oh. Dear. Oh my. I'd start getting worried if people start making fanfilms to the degree of "The Search for Gollum" which is about to be released.

I have several friends that have attended art school. Their homework assignments are stuff just like this; 3d modeling of objects interacting with each other.

Hilarious idea though hahahaha.
That was brilliant.
Looks like Favre against the Raiders to me...
BOOO this Man... except i'm a raiders fan....
I wonder if the same artist could show Jaime using a computer keyboard :)
comments.subject: The sound of one hand...

comments.article: there's a link in that to an impossible cast for ASOFAI and wow... that person went all out... really you should watch that... yeah allstar cast but really.... they did it well
huh. nicole kidman for cersei. she'd look the part but i wonder if she could do the mean side...
For the man who has nothing to hide...but still wants to ... rofl
Made of WIN!!!

comments.upictitle: Jenna: Sugar and spice and all that
comments.article: Now I want to know if that was part of something bigger!
Put that in an endless loop and it's art. Srsly. I think it's brilliant.

*dies laughing* You just gotta wonder how readers come up with this stuff. Although, I think a Norse god sleepwalking into a well is the pinnacle of crackbrained imagination (...so what if that idea was mine? >.>).
When i think about the kind of person it takes to bother making vids like this it makes me feel like ponies and rainbows dont exist anymore
ROTFL.
I am also amused.
Hell, I'll audition for that part.

comments.upictitle: Welcome to Hermitville. Population One.: pic#68480714
comments.article: Well, I was expecting something a little more substantial, but I managed a chuckle anyway.

nice
